channel.title: Las Vegas|San Miguel County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Las Vegas|San Miguel County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: Mills Ave. West at NM-518
item.description: Mills Ave. west at NM-518. Use NM-518 north for Storrie Lake (State Park), Mora, and Taos. From the documentation I can find, it appears that Mills Ave. was formerly signed as NM-329. There were no NM-329 shields along Mills Ave. in 2013, when this picture was taken. This is also the southern end of NM-518, which used to extend south through Las Vegas to BL-25.

item.title: Mills Ave. - To NM-65/NM-518
item.description: Mills Ave. west, To NM-65/NM-518 in Las Vegas.

item.title: BL-25 North (Grand Ave.) at Mills Ave.
item.description: BL-25 North (Grand Ave.) at Mills Ave., which leads to NM-518 and NM-65. Mills Ave. formerly used to be NM-329.

item.title: BL-25 North in Las Vegas
item.description: BL-25 north, To NM-518 and NM-65 in Las Vegas.

item.title: BL-25 North (Grand Ave.) at NM-104
item.description: BL-25 North (Grand Ave.) at NM-104 in Las Vegas. Turn right on NM-104 east for I-25, Conchas Lake (State Park), Tucumcari, and State Police.

item.title: BL-25 North (Grand Ave.) Approaching NM-104
item.description: BL-25 North (Grand Ave.) approaching NM-104 in Las Vegas. Continue north on Grand Ave. for NM-518.

item.title: BL-25 North (Grand Ave.) at 7th St.
item.description: BL-25 North (Grand Ave.) at 7th Ave. NM-518 used to run down 7th St. in Las Vegas. Now NM-518 ends at Mills Ave., north of here, and the preferred route through Las Vegas is to take Grand Ave. north to Mills Ave.

item.title: BL-25 North (Grand Ave.) at NM-329 (New Mexico Ave.)
item.description: BL-25 North (Grand Ave.) at NM-329 (New Mexico Ave.). This sign assembly says that New Mexico Ave. leads to NM-329. It appears that NM-329 runs down New Mexico Ave. and intersects Grand Ave. here, and the TO text is erroneous. Turn left on NM-329 for New Mexico Behavioral Health Institute and Luna Community College.

item.title: BL-25 North Approaching NM-329
item.description: BL-25 north approaching NM-329. Use NM-329 north for United World College, Old Town Plaza, and Historic Church.

item.title: BL-25 North (Grand Ave.) Approaching NM-329
item.description: BL-25 north (Grand Ave.) approaching NM-329, in Las Vegas.

item.title: BL-25 North (Grand Ave.) at I-25 South
item.description: BL-25 North (Grand Ave.) at I-25 South to Santa Fe. Continue north on BL-25 for Las Vegas.

item.title: BL-25 North (Grand Ave.) - To NM-329/To NM-518
item.description: BL-25 North (Grand Ave.) - To NM-329/To NM-518.

item.title: I-25 North at BL-25 - To NM-329/To NM-283
item.description: I-25 north, Exit 343 offramp. Turn right for NM-283 to San Geronimo; turn left for BL-25 and NM-329 to Las Vegas and Storrie Lake (State Park).

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 343
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 343 - BL-25/NM-329/NM-283/Las Vegas.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 383
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 383 - BL-25/NM-329/NM-283/Las Vegas. This is the southern end of the Las Vegas business loop.

item.title: I-25 North Approaching Exit 343
item.description: I-25 north approaching Exit 343. Use Exit 343 for NM-518 North to Mora and Storrie Lake State Park.
